summary: A French village doctor becomes the target of poison-pen letters sent to village leaders, accusing him of affairs and practicing abortion.
cast: Pierre Fresnay|Ginette Leclerc|Micheline Francey|Héléna Manson|Jeanne Fusier-Gir|Sylvie|Liliane Maigné|Pierre Larquey|Noël Roquevert|Bernard Lancret|Antoine Balpêtré|Jean Brochard|Pierre Bertin|Louis Seigner|Roger Blin|Robert Clermont|Palau|Marcel Delaître|Paul Barge|Lucienne Bogaert|Albert Brouett|Marie-Jacqueline Chantal|Nicole Chollet|Etienne Decroux|Gustave Gallet|Palmyre Levasseur|Albert Malbert|Pâquerette|Eugène Yvernès
director: Director: Henri-Georges Clouzot (as Henri Georges Clouzot)
title: El cuervo
